items.title: Trump Flaunts Pardon Rules — and Costs Victims and Taxpayers More Than $1 Billion
items.description: Many of the president’s recent pardons violate Justice Department policies designed to ensure fairness and public safety.

items.title: How Faulty Drug Tests Turn New Parents’ Lives Upside-Down
items.description: Watch our joint investigation with CBS Sunday Morning into how hospitals use unreliable test results to report parents to child welfare agencies.

items.title: New York’s Prison Guard Strike Ended Months Ago. For Some, Life-Threatening Effects Persist.
items.description: Staffing shortages mean incarcerated people are not getting vital medical care, programming and other services.

items.title: Galvanized by Trump, These States Are Passing Harsh New Laws Against Immigrants
items.description: The policies create new restrictions for immigrants and people who support them — including reviving measures previously rejected by courts.

items.title: They’re Facing Deportation with Severe Mental Illness — And Now Without a Lawyer
items.description: The Trump administration recently ended a legal aid program, leaving immigrants who have mental health disorders on their own.
